titleStmt.title: The dying lamentation of Thomas Randal, who was executed at Stone-Bridge, on VVednesday the 29th of January for the barbarous murder committed on Roger Leavens, ironmonger who is hang'd in chains near Stone-Bridge. To the tune of, Johnsons farewell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Moore,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
